title: Allocate
lyrics:
I arrived at two
From a thought I had
Talking with you
In the back of a cab
Once we were lost

And we never came back

I can only exist so long as you live



Don't give up on me

If I ever leave this town

Ain't it sad to see

Your love don't work out

What made you think I would leave you

Waiting around for the witches to drown



Allocate



I suppose I could

Be here in the now

Still we find ourselves in the past year

Dear Molly H, I'm fed up with myself

And the tears I hold on to aren't good for my health



Allocate



Once I was lost and I never came back

I can only exist long as you live

What made you think I could live in your frown

As you waiting around for the witches to drown



Allocate

Allocate
